tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tax_compliance_regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  regulation_description TEXT,
  update_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE tax_updates (
    update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
    update_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    update_date TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_regulation_id FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES tax_regulations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_updates (
    update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
    update_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    update_date TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_regulation_id FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES tax_regulations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_reporting_history (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reported_date DATE,
    reported_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    country_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (country_id) REFERENCES country_tax_rates(country_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_regulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_status (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  review_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE authority_agency (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(100),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE updates_log (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  update_type VARCHAR(50),
  update_description TEXT,
  update_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE regulation_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_id INT,
    update_date DATE,
    update_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES tax_regulations(regulation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE update_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    update_id INT,
    update_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (update_id) REFERENCES regulation_updates(update_id)
);
